<div class="timeline">
<div class="timecontainer left">
  <div class="date">JAN 2021</div>
  <i class="icon fa fa-lightbulb"></i>
  <div class="content">
  <h2>Hello World</h2>
  <p>Inspired by Toke Høye’s [PollinatorWatch](https://www.zooniverse.org/projects/tokehoye/pollinatorwatch), Operation GaliWatch is born. We order weather monitoring hardware and start putting together the Raspberry Pi setup.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="timecontainer right">
  <div class="date">MAR 2021</div>
  <i class="icon fa fa-walking"></i>
  <div class="content">
  <h2>First Steps</h2>
  <p>The setup is ready cameras positioned, air quality and weather sensors fine-tuned and working well, and we collect our first datapoints!  
   First bee of the year spotted on Mar 8th - a Sitka bumble bee. </p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="timecontainer left">
  <div class="date">APR 2021</div>
  <i class="icon fa fa-users"></i>
  <div class="content">
  <h2>Making Friends</h2>
  <p>We get in touch with [Biodiversity Galiano](https://biogaliano.org/), and connect with [IMERSS](https://imerss.org/)</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="timecontainer right">
  <div class="date">MAY 2021</div>
  <i class="icon fab fa-pagelines"></i>
  <div class="content">
  <h2>Pilot Project</h2>
  <p>We measure pollinator activity and environmental data at our pilot site. </p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="timecontainer left">

  <i class="icon far fa-chart-bar"></i>
